name: Canticles of Harmony
desc: A World Quest Series following Osse, a mysterious white cat, to resolve the crisis Petrichor is facing.

imgDesc.text: Complete the Quest Series to obtain the Avatar

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Unlock Requirements</color>
Enter <color=#ece5d8>Petrichor</color> <color=#ffffff73>and talk to Leader by the Statue of the Seven</color>
<color=#ffffff>Starting Location</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Petrichor, Fontaine</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Chain</color>
World Quest Series:

customize.name: Canticles of Harmony
customize.desc: A World Quest Series following Osse, a mysterious white cat, to resolve the crisis Petrichor is facing.

customize.name: The Shadow Over Petrichor
customize.desc: You encounter a series of strange occurrences after arriving in Petrichor for the first time. You decide to get to the bottom of it allâ€¦

customize.name: Underwater Nocturne
customize.desc: In order to rescue the people of Petrichor, you follow the strange cat named "Osse" into the mysterious Faded Castle...

customize.name: The Last Day of Remuria
customize.desc: After learning the true identity of "Monsieur Os," you decide to go to the Sea of Bygone Eras to track down Boethius...

customize.name: Gradus ad Capitolium
customize.desc: After passing through the perilous oceanic trench, you finally arrive at the ancient sunken capital of Remuria. Next, you must head to "Domus Aurea" for a showdown with Boethius...

customize.name: Fortune Plango Vulnera
customize.desc: For Monsieur Os, and for everyone in town, take on Boethius in a final battle!

customize.name: Remus
customize.desc: The God King who built Remuria.

customize.name: Cassiodor
customize.desc: Golden Hunter, one of Remus's Harmosts.

customize.name: Boethius
customize.desc: One of Remus's Harmosts.

customize.name: Scylla
customize.desc: The Prince of Vishaps and Remus's friend.

customize.name: Legatus Golem
customize.desc:
A centaur-shaped golem forged of marble and brass. Under the hard stone exterior flows Ichor blood. Towering as one who commands a legion, it is ready to trample any foe that might transgress against its honor.

The now sunken civilization believed that war was as music, an art of rhythms to be followed. Therefore, one who marshals a legion must be like a conductor, whose shield and sword are like the strings and bow of a violin, performing a blazing melody like the raging flames upon the merciless battlefield.

"War is a necessary evil on the path to all-encompassing peace." Thus spake a Harmost, one who once led the golem legions to conquest over the entire high sea.

customize.name: Ancient Autoharmonic Music Box
customize.desc:
An ancient music box found in the Faded Castle. It contains the mysterious power of the Symphony.

Use it to read musical scores left by the ancient civilization. Find more scores to unlock the civilization's secrets.

customize.name: Ancient Score
customize.desc:
This seems to be a musical score created using unknown materials by an ancient civilization.

The melody recorded within can only be deciphered using a special device.

customize.name: Blank Score
customize.desc:
This seems to be a musical score created using unknown materials by an ancient civilization.

Its staves lie empty. No notes have ever been recorded here.
